alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Franklin; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 11:35PM CDT until June 25 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Franklin County in south central Nebraska... Phelps County in south central Nebraska... Kearney County in south central Nebraska... Southern Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... Northeastern Harlan County in south central Nebraska... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1134 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Elm Creek to near Funk to near Ragan, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Axtell around 1145 PM CDT. Wilcox around 1150 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Kearney, Minden, Hildreth and Upland. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 260 and 289. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
